item.title: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour in Miami
item.description: Experience the sights and sounds of Miami’s vibrant Little Havana neighborhood on this guided walking food tour. Explore this lively Cuban district and learn about its fascinating history and culture, with stops at some of the best family-owned and operated Cuban restaurants in the area. Sample the local cuisine, like guava pastries, chicken plantain cups, and flan ice cream, to name just a few of the delicacies offered along the way. Also, meet some of the local artists, watch skilled Cuban cigar rollers and listen to traditional Cuban music.

image.alt: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour in Miami

item.title: Speedboat Sightseeing Adventure of Miami
item.description: Cruise the Miami coastline 'Miami Vice-style' on this speedboat cruise. Settle in to your plush seat as your expert captain pilots the speedboat down the sandy shoreline, where you can view Fisher Island and Star Island's collection of multi-millionaire and celebrity homes. Buzz by Miami Beach, where the locals strut their stuff in sun and you can snap photos of the Art Deco mansions lining South Beach.

image.alt: Speedboat Sightseeing Adventure of Miami

item.title: Everglades Tour from Miami with Transportation
item.description: Escape to the wilderness of Everglades on this most of the time 4-5 hour small-group adventure from Miami. This exciting nature tour includes a narrated airboat ride through the unique ecosystem of the Florida Everglades. Enjoy the scenery, learn about the history and flora, and look for Florida’s abundant wildlife, like alligators, crocodiles, birds, fish, exotic snakes and more. The total 4-5 hour duration of this tour begins upon hotel pick-up.

image.alt: Everglades Tour from Miami with Transportation

item.title: 2 hrs Miami Private Boat Tour with Cooler, Ice, Bluetooth Stereo
item.description: Discover Miami from the water with a private evening boat tour. Climb aboard a boat with private captain and set out into the bay for a scenic cruise. See the twinkling city skyline and local landmarks like Star Island during this after-dark tour. Customize the itinerary according to your interests and get to know Miami from a fresh perspective.

image.alt: 2 hrs Miami Private Boat Tour with Cooler, Ice, Bluetooth Stereo

item.title: Wynwood Graffiti Golf Cart Small-Group Tour
item.description: Get an express tour of the street art in Miami's Wynwood neighborhood via golf cart. Ride around the revitalized district with your guide, marveling at the graffiti and murals. Bring your camera for fantastic snaps of art by local painters such as Shepard Fairey, Retna, DFace, and Interesni. This small-group tour ensures an intimate atmosphere and plenty of opportunity to ask questions.

image.alt: Wynwood Graffiti Golf Cart Small-Group Tour

item.title: The Official Art Deco Walking Tour by The Miami Design Preservation League
item.description: Get to know the Art Deco history of Miami Beach with a guided walking tour. Learn about local architecture and heritage from a Miami Design Preservation League guide. See a wide range of Art Deco architecture in Miami Beach and hear stories about the history and preservation of this protected district. Tours include admission to the Art Deco Museum and Gift Shop.

image.alt: The Official Art Deco Walking Tour by The Miami Design Preservation League

item.title: Biscayne Bay Millionaire's Row Boat Tour
item.description: See the sites of Miami from the water on this sightseeing cruise along Biscayne Bay. Travel the crystal clear waters of Biscayne Bay and enjoy the view of Miami’s breathtaking waterfront. See the sun-splashed downtown Miami skyline, the mansions of the rich and famous, the Venetian Islands, the Port of Miami, Miami Beach, and much more.

image.alt: Biscayne Bay Millionaire's Row Boat Tour

item.title: South Beach Cultural Food and Walking Tour
item.description: Eat your way through the Latin flavors of South Beach on this food‐filled walking tour. Accompany your guide on a sensory journey to local restaurants and foodie hideaways. Along the way, learn about the commingling of cultures that define Miami’s culture, neighborhoods, and culinary history. Try cuisines such as Peruvian, Italian, Colombian, Mediterranean, Cuban, and Spanish.

image.alt: South Beach Cultural Food and Walking Tour

item.title: A Taste of South Beach Food Tour
item.description: Experience the vibrant culture and diverse cuisine of the bustling South Beach neighborhood of Miami on this guided small-group food tour. Led by an enthusiastic and knowledgeable local foodie guide, various cuisines at some of the most popular restaurants in South Beach. Learn about the history, culture, and architecture of the trendy, quirky Art Deco District and find out why it’s one of the most popular hot spots in the world. Food tastings and beverages included.

image.alt: A Taste of South Beach Food Tour

item.title: Miami South Beach Art Deco Walking Tour
item.description: See the gorgeous Art Deco architecture in South Beach on a guided walking tour that explores landmark buildings and out-of-the-way gems. You’ll learn the history of South Beach as you walk through the ocean-side neighborhood, with fascinating stories about mob life, Hollywood glamour, and modern design, and you'll hear about the area's outrageous characters and scandals. Since this tour begins and ends in the heart of South Beach, it’s a great way to get oriented in one of Miami’s most vibrant neighborhoods, with a local guide to lead the way.

image.alt: Miami South Beach Art Deco Walking Tour

item.title: Miami Pirate Boat Tour: Skyline & Millionaire's Homes
item.description: See the sights of Miami from the water on this sightseeing cruise along Biscayne Bay. Travel the waters of Biscayne Bay on the only pirate ship in Miami and enjoy the city’s breathtaking waterfront. See the downtown Miami skyline, the mansions of the rich and famous, the Venetian Islands, the Port of Miami, Miami Beach, and more. This is a fun, family-friendly activity and features a crew dressed up in colorful pirate attire.

image.alt: Miami Pirate Boat Tour: Skyline & Millionaire's Homes

item.title: Private Boat Ride in Miami with Experienced Captain and Champagne
item.description: Sidestep the crowds by skipping the typical big boat tours and embarking on a private cruise around Miami instead. In the company of just your party and the crew, set sail along Biscayne Bay and take in some of Miami's best sights, including Millionaire Row, Star Island and Downtown Miami, from the water book in the last time slot of the day and enjoy an impressive sunset private cruise.

image.alt: Private Boat Ride in Miami with Experienced Captain and Champagne

item.title: Miami Sunset and City Lights Cocktail Cruise
item.description: Take time out from the daily grind and enjoy wine, beer, prosecco, and frozen cocktails on this two hour cruise along Miami’s coastline. Relax as the sun sets over Miami and then enjoy Miami’s spectacular nighttime skyline light up before you. You get 2 hours of relaxing music, unlimited drinks, and beautiful sights to unwind and de-stress with your family or friends. Seats are limited so make sure to book early. Please note this is not a party cruise, it is a way to relax after a hard week and enjoy the beautiful sights with an eclectic mix of music.

image.alt: Miami Sunset and City Lights Cocktail Cruise

item.title: Nature & Island Exploration on SUP/Kayak
item.description: With this tour, benefit from the flexibility of being able to choose between stand-up paddleboarding or kayaking—depending on your preferences—with equipment rental included. The route takes you off the beaten path to a lush mangrove jungle, where you can paddle along canals and look out for local wildlife. Potential sightings could include dolphins, manatees, crabs, iguanas, raccoons, or birds—as well as beautiful plants and scenic views along the way too.

image.alt: Nature & Island Exploration on SUP/Kayak

item.title: Authentic Little Havana Food and Culture Walking Tour
item.description: Learn all about Cuban culture in Miami on this food and culture tour of Little Havana. With a guide in the lead, you'll visit important Cuban landmarks such as Cuban Memorial Park and the Bay of Pigs Museum, listening to in-depth commentary about Cuban heritage in Miami. Your guide will take you to the very best Cuban family-owned restaurants, where you can sample stewed meat and Guava pastries, among other delicacies.

image.alt: Authentic Little Havana Food and Culture Walking Tour

item.title: 1-Hour Air boat Ride and Nature Walk with Naturalist in Everglades National Park
item.description: Explore the Everglades National Park with a naturalist guide, including an airboat ride and a nature walk, on this half-day tour. Learn about the area ecosystems and view alligators and local birdlife. On the smaller air boat, travel way out far from land and become immersed in the culture and remote beauty of the Native way of life, including a stop to a Native tree island village or two. A narrated scenic drive led by the master naturalist and round-trip transportation from your hotel or vacation rental in Miami, Hollywood, Ft. Lauderdale, or the port in Ft. Lauderdale or Miami included.

image.alt: 1-Hour Air boat Ride and Nature Walk with Naturalist in Everglades National Park

item.title: Top Miami Skyline Boat Cruise | water tours
item.description: Experience the magic of a Miami sunset on a journey through Biscayne Bay on this evening cruise. Pass by the luxurious mansions of Star Island, Fisher Island, and Venetian Islands while enjoying fascinating commentary from a bilingual guide. Capture stunning photos and enjoy unobstructed views. You can also upgrade to include a bottle of champagne for two or four.

image.alt: Top Miami Skyline Boat Cruise | water tours

item.title: Miami Party Boat Cruise Music & Skyline Views 1 Hour 20Min of Fun
item.description: Dance under the starry Miami skies aboard a party boat with a pirate theme and a DJ who plays the latest tunes. The boat cruises the calm waters of Miami while you dance a sip a complimentary glass of beer; other drinks are available for purchase. This 75-minute cruise is a perfect way to wrap up a fantastic day in Miami.

image.alt: Miami Party Boat Cruise Music & Skyline Views 1 Hour 20Min of Fun

item.title: Cultural and Food Walking Tour through Little Havana in Miami
item.description: Immerse yourself in the rhythms, flavors, and culture of Little Havana on a walking tour of the historic neighborhood that’s led by a local guide. Stroll through a bustling farmer’s market, watch expert cigar rollers at work, taste the finest Cuban coffee, then finish the morning with a lunch of classic Cuban cuisine. As you walk through Little Havana, learn the history and back stories that keep the neighborhood vibrant, from public artwork to the game-playing regulars at Domino Park.

image.alt: Cultural and Food Walking Tour through Little Havana in Miami

item.title: Miami: 2 Hour Private Yacht Cruise with Champagne
item.description: Get out on the water and see Miami’s sights from a new vantage point with this private yacht adventure. A stress-free alternative to crowded boat tours, this cruise is just for your party, which guarantees privacy and plenty of room to relax. While enjoying the views—such as the Bayside Marketplace—benefit from onboard perks such as a Bluetooth sound system to play your favorite tunes and alcoholic beverages.

image.alt: Miami: 2 Hour Private Yacht Cruise with Champagne

item.title: Miami Private Skyline Boat Cruise with champagne
item.description: See a brand-new perspective on glittering Miami—and enjoy a stress-free, relaxing way to travel—on board a private sunset/nighttime cruise. Once the sun has set, meet your captain in Coconut Grove, and hop aboard: you’ll explore the city’s waterways in a luxurious Monterey vessel. Cruise along the Rickenbacker Causeway to Star Island, admire the Miami skyline, and pass by Brickell’s skyscrapers before returning to your start point.

image.alt: Miami Private Skyline Boat Cruise with champagne

item.title: Sail Biscayne Bay: An Intimate Eco-Adventure
item.description: See the beauty of Biscayne Bay from a whole new perspective with this sailing adventure. Ride along the coastline in an eco-friendly wind-powered sailing boat, and visit sandbars, mangroves, and islets along the way. If you're lucky—you may even spot dolphins or manatees—which are frequently spotted around the bay.

image.alt: Sail Biscayne Bay: An Intimate Eco-Adventure

item.title: Miami Island Ultimate Adventure
item.description: Cruise on a catamaran to Flagler Monument Island, or another unique destination for a half-day sun and beach adventure. After the boat tour to the island, choose between several activities including kayaking, stand-up paddleboarding, or jumping on a giant water trampoline. Take in views of Star Island, home to Miami’s rich and famous, as you relax on the beach or go swimming.

image.alt: Miami Island Ultimate Adventure

item.title: Miami Moonlit ATV Adventure: Explore Redland's Hidden Trails
item.description:
At Redland ATV Tour, we take pride in offering a truly unique and unforgettable adventure like no other. Here's why you should choose us to have an exceptional experience in Miami:
1. Nighttime Thrill: Embrace the thrill of ATV riding under the enchanting Miami night sky, setting us apart from the usual daytime tours.
2. Family & Friends: Forge stronger bonds as you share the excitement with your loved ones, creating cherished memories together.
3. Hidden Gems: Venture into the untouched beauty of Redland, uncovering Miami's hidden natural treasures.
4. Expert Guides: Our experienced guides ensure your safety, making every moment worry-free and enjoyable.
5. Unforgettable Memories: Capture moments against the captivating night backdrop, etching memories that last a lifetime.
Choose Redland ATV Tour for an extraordinary Miami escapade and make your trip an extraordinary one!

image.alt: Miami Moonlit ATV Adventure: Explore Redland's Hidden Trails
